original_text: First, I hear that there are separate groups when you meet together as God's people. I believe that some of what I have heard about you is true.
korean_text: 먼저 너희가 교회에 모일 때에 너희 중에 분쟁이 있다 함을 듣고 어느 정도 믿거니와

sentences.original_text: First, I hear that there are separate groups
when you meet together as God's people.
I believe that some of what I have heard about you
